txt.en: Speak with the mission giver and let them know that you are ready to investigate the tower.
'Quick work, [placeholder]. With the courtyard clear, you should be able to assault the tower itself, and find the Orc commander above.'
'Take care [placeholder]. The Orcs in that tower will offer you no quarter.'
The tower courtyard has been cleared of foes. Speak with the mission giver in order to continue your assault.
There is no twist in this mission.

A particularly brutal Orc captain has made the old tower of Tharbad his base of operations. You have been asked to clear the courtyard approaching the tower of defenders to open the way for an attack on the tower itself.

'A particularly cruel and brutal Orkish captain has claimed the upper floors of the ruined tower of Tharbad as his stronghold. If we are to drive the Orcs from Tharbad, we will need to defeat him.\n\n'First you will need to cross the river to the island on which the tower stands. Once there, clear the courtyard below the tower of defenders.'
Complete the Mission: Tharbad Tower Courtyard
Return to Hithriel and inform him of your success
